atlantis_talk_02_friend_01a: Eu... Quase nunca vi minha mãe na minha vida.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_01b: Eu... Quase nunca vi meu pai na minha vida.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_botan_01: Oh? É hora da revelação do passado?[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_02:
El[a;e:gs]e estava sempre ocupado com o trabalho.
Quase nunca voltava para casa.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_03:
Eu cozinhava, limpava sempre sozinho...
Mabosstiff era o meu único companheiro.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_03a:
So, yeah, I don’t really know her at all. Even if
she is my mom.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_03b:
So, yeah, I don’t really know him at all. Even if
he is my dad.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_04a:
I tried not to think too much about it. Tried to
just be proud that she was this famous genius.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_04b:
I tried not to think too much about it. Tried to
just be proud that he was this famous genius.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_05:
But the truth is, I would’ve rather just had a [mom;dad:gs]
who was there...even if [s;:gs]he wasn’t anything great.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_06:
I haven’t seen h[er;im:gs] for ages now. Unless you count
seeing h[er;im:gs] in the news or whatever.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_07:
Used to at least get emails sometimes.
But even those stopped a couple years ago.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_08:
And then there [s;:gs]he appears, out of the blue, and
tells me we’ve gotta come to Area Zero? Tch.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_botan_04: We’re not here to judge or anything...[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_02_botan_05:
And...I’m sorry about earlier. I shouldn’t have
snapped at you like that...[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_10:
Naw, I was also giving you a hard time.
Sorry...uh...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_11:
You know...you’re actually pretty nice for a little
pipsqueak![npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_02_botan_07: Heh... Don’t call me pipsqueak, you big lunk.[npcn:8]
